description: Two storey side extension and part single, part two storey rear extension with the addition of steps
decision_conditions: The proposed development by reason of the resultant scale, bulk and mass of the host property and design concept of the extensions proposed cumulatively would be detrimental to the character and appearance of the host property and would be contrary to Havering Local Plan Policies 7 and 26 and the design guidance within the Council's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD.

The combined depth and width of the first floor rear projection in conjunction with site circumstances would result in this part of the development forming an overbearing and intrusive piece of development detrimental to the amenity of the occupiers of 104 Lake Rise therefore contrary to Havering Local Plan Policies 7 and 26 and the design guidance within the Council's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent in writing 09-01-2023.
